title: Test Issue: harfbuzz
body:
Running 
```
spack install --test=root harfbuzz
```

results in
```
==> Installing harfbuzz-2.6.8-2h6bze7m4ztvxtg56pzgeosnhlre3gzg
==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable certificate verification.
```
